Explanation:

The "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph are "PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)" and "PDTP - DTDPP(EH)". These are the names of the bulk samples whose XRD patterns were recorded to understand their structures in the solid state.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| PDTP - DTDPP(EH) |

Explanation:

The "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph are "PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)" and "PDTP - DTDPP(EH)". These are the names of the bulk samples whose XRD patterns were recorded to understand their structures in the solid state.

The other entities in the paragraph, such as "XRD patterns", "solid state", and "structures" are not "Value of material property" entities. "XRD patterns" are the results of an experimental technique used to study the crystal structure of materials. "Solid state" is a physical property of matter, but it is not a value of a material property. "Structures" are the arrangements of atoms or molecules in a material, but they are not values of material properties.
